title: Drawing, "A Seated Dog and Ferns", September 1844
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in black crayon with date at top right.
Verso:  Inscirbed in black crayon with date between the two designs.
description:
Recto:  Vertical view of an evergreen in a storm swept country.
Verso:  Horizontal view of a seated dog shown turned toward the left and ferns
upon an outlined boulder.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Seated Dog and Ferns", September 1844.
September 1844. Black crayon on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-23-a.
